summary: A series of Bureau of Prisons count sheets, inmate rosters, and out-count forms from the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York on August 10-11, 2019. These are routine administrative documents tracking inmate population, assignments, and movements within the facility.

keyFacts: These are routine Bureau of Prisons administrative records (count sheets, rosters, out-count forms) from the New York MCC on August 10-11, 2019.
The documents show a total inmate census of approximately 756 across various housing units (B-A, C-A, E-N, E-S, G-N, G-S, H-A, I-N, K-N, K-S, R-A, Z-A, Z-B).
Several inmates are listed with 'SUICIDE OR' (suicide observation) status, including Decapua, Mcduffie, Walker, Woolaston, and Conley.
One inmate, Tartaglione, is listed with an 'ATTY' (attorney visit) assignment on August 11, 2019.
The documents contain numerous redacted or illegible staff signatures and inmate names on count slips and out-count forms.
